name: From TV Animation Slam Dunk: Gakeppuchi no Kesshou League
overview: Based on Takehiko Inoue's Slam Dunk manga/anime, this game focuses on basketball team management. After the player picks a team, a menu is used to decide individual team members' roles. During the gameplay, the player coordinates the players around the court. In closeups, the closest team member to the ball must be controlled to defend, take the ball or score points.
